DOC.brief_summary: Supervised nonpharmacologic therapy improve cognitive function patient Mild Cognitive Impairment
DOC.brief_title: Effect Non-pharmacological Therapy Cognitive Function Patients With Cognitive Impairment
DOC.criteria: Patients 60 year old Mild Cognitive Impairment accord Petersen Criteria Phone number available Untreated depression Evidence reversible cause cognitive decline Dementia type stage Severe sensory deficit unresolved Metastatic cancer Hemoglobin level < 8g/dL Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease Gold stage 3 4 Congestive Heart Failure decompensated , unstable angina Functional Class IV accord New York Heart Association Participation another protocol prevent participation research Chronic use benzodiazepine , tricyclic antidepressant Patients whose place residence attend session
